class.name: ComputeShaderKernel
class.description: A single entry-point of a [ComputeShaderFile]. Contains both the compiled SPIR-V associated with the kernel, and reflection metadata exposing information about the shader.

members.member: Reflection information about the buffers used by this kernel.
The name of this kernel. By default, this will match the entry-point function name declared in the shader.
Reflection information about the shader parameters used by this kernel.
The SPIR-V intermediate representation of this kernel.
The thread group size declared for this kernel.
Reflection information about any declared attributes on the entry-point function.
